verses.verse: Then there arose a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6818>cry<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> and of their <S%H802>wives<s%> against their <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%>.

For there <S%H3426>were<s%> that <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H1121>We<s%>, our sons and our <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, are <S%H7227>many<s%>: let us <S%H3947>get<s%> <S%H1715>grain<s%>, that we may <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H2421>live<s%>.

Some also there <S%H3426>were<s%> that <S%H559>said<s%>, We are <S%H6148>mortgaging<s%> our <S%H7704>fields<s%>, and our <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>, and our <S%H1004>houses<s%>: let us <S%H3947>get<s%> <S%H1715>grain<s%>, because of the <S%H7458>dearth<s%>.

There <S%H3426>were<s%> also that <S%H559>said<s%>, We have <S%H3867>borrowed<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> for the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H4060>tribute<s%> upon our <S%H7704>fields<s%> and our <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>.

Yet now our <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is as the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of our <S%H251>brethren<s%>, our <S%H1121>children<s%> as their <S%H1121>children<s%>: <S%H3533>and<s%>, lo, we bring into bondage our <S%H1121>sons<s%> and our <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to be <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and some of our <S%H1323>daughters<s%> <S%H3426>are<s%> brought into <S%H3533>bondage<s%> <S%H410>already<s%>: neither is it in our power to help <S%H312>it<s%>; for other men have our <S%H7704>fields<s%> and our <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>.
And I was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2734>angry<s%> when I <S%H8085>heard<s%> their <S%H2201>cry<s%> and these <S%H1697>words<s%>.

Then I <S%H4427>consulted<s%> with <S%H3820>myself<s%>, and <S%H7378>contended<s%> with the <S%H2715>nobles<s%> and the <S%H5461>rulers<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5383>them<s%>, Ye exact <S%H4855>usury<s%>, every <S%H376>one<s%> of his <S%H251>brother<s%>. And I <S%H5414>held<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> assembly against <S%H6952>them<s%>.

And I <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1767>them<s%>, We after our ability have <S%H7069>redeemed<s%> our <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%>, that were <S%H4376>sold<s%> unto the <S%H1471>nations<s%>; and would ye even <S%H4376>sell<s%> your <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and should they be <S%H4376>sold<s%> unto <S%H2790>us<s%>? Then held they their peace, and <S%H4672>found<s%> never a <S%H1697>word<s%>.

Also I <S%H559>said<s%>, The thing <S%H1697>that<s%> ye <S%H6213>do<s%> is not <S%H2896>good<s%>: ought ye not to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%>, because of the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> our <S%H341>enemies<s%>?

And I <S%H251>likewise<s%>, my brethren and my <S%H5288>servants<s%>, do <S%H5383>lend<s%> them <S%H3701>money<s%> and <S%H1715>grain<s%>. I pray <S%H5800>you<s%>, let us leave off this <S%H4855>usury<s%>.

Restore <S%H7725><s%>, I pray <S%H3117>you<s%>, to them, even this day, their <S%H7704>fields<s%>, their <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>, their <S%H2132>oliveyards<s%>, and their <S%H1004>houses<s%>, also the <S%H3967>hundredth<s%> part of the <S%H3701>money<s%>, and of the <S%H1715>grain<s%>, the new <S%H8492>wine<s%>, and the <S%H3323>oil<s%>, that ye exact of <S%H5383>them<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H7725>they<s%>, We will restore <S%H1245>them<s%>, and will require nothing of <S%H6213>them<s%>; so will we do, even as thou <S%H559>sayest<s%>. Then I <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and took an <S%H7650>oath<s%> of <S%H6213>them<s%>, that they would do according to this <S%H1697>promise<s%>.

Also I <S%H5287>shook<s%> out my <S%H2684>lap<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, So <S%H430>God<s%> shake <S%H5287>out<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> from his <S%H1004>house<s%>, and from his <S%H3018>labor<s%>, that <S%H6965>performeth<s%> not this <S%H1697>promise<s%>; even thus be he shaken <S%H5287>out<s%>, and <S%H7386>emptied<s%>. And all the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H543>Amen<s%>, and <S%H1984>praised<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>. And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to this <S%H1697>promise<s%>.

Moreover from the <S%H3117>time<s%> that I was <S%H6680>appointed<s%> to be their <S%H6346>governor<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, from the <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> even unto the <S%H8147>two<s%> and <S%H7970>thirtieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H783>Artaxerxes<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, that <S%H8147>is<s%>, twelve <S%H8141>years<s%>, I and my <S%H251>brethren<s%> have not <S%H398>eaten<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of the <S%H6346>governor<s%>.

But the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H6346>governors<s%> that were <S%H6440>before<s%> me were <S%H3513>chargeable<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> of them <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H3196>wine<s%>, <S%H310>besides<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>; <S%H1571>yea<s%>, even their <S%H5288>servants<s%> bare <S%H7980>rule<s%> over the <S%H5971>people<s%>: but so <S%H6213>did<s%> not <S%H6440>I<s%>, because of the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.

Yea <S%H2388><s%>, also I continued in the <S%H4399>work<s%> of this <S%H2346>wall<s%>, neither <S%H7069>bought<s%> we any <S%H7704>land<s%>: and all my <S%H5288>servants<s%> were <S%H6908>gathered<s%> thither unto the <S%H4399>work<s%>.

Moreover there were at my <S%H7979>table<s%>, of the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> and the <S%H5461>rulers<s%>, a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H935>men<s%>, besides those that came unto us from among the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that were round about <S%H5439>us<s%>.

Now that which was <S%H6213>prepared<s%> for one <S%H3117>day<s%> was <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7794>ox<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H1305>choice<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%>; also <S%H6833>fowls<s%> were <S%H6213>prepared<s%> for <S%H6235>me<s%>, and once in ten <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H7235>store<s%> of all sorts of <S%H3196>wine<s%>: yet for <S%H5973>all<s%> this I <S%H1245>demanded<s%> not the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of the <S%H6346>governor<s%>, because the <S%H5656>bondage<s%> was <S%H3513>heavy<s%> upon this <S%H5971>people<s%>.
Remember <S%H2142><s%> unto <S%H430>me<s%>, O my God, for <S%H2896>good<s%>, all that I have <S%H6213>done<s%> for this <S%H5971>people<s%>.
